divs: Sighting Detailsi was taking out the trash and saw out of the corner of my eye 3 red lights in the sky. at first a thought it was a c-130 but the lights were to far apart to be an aircraft and the lights were stationary, hovering in the sky. they styed there for about 60 seconds and than the light on the left slowly faded away, than the light at the top of the triangle slowly faded away, and than the last one on the left did the same. there was no sound. i was shocked! i ran as fast as i could and told my friends.
Summary: 3 red balls of light in triangle formation, and slowly faded away one at a time from left to right.
